title: Anyone have any T202 Cubs for Sale?
author: JasonL

posts.post_title: Anyone have any T202 Cubs for Sale?
posts.post_content:
Thought I'd start on this team set...

SGC graded is preferred, PSA is fine, and raw is ok if you guarantee it will grade numerically.

Please feel free to send scans and asking prices to me at:  [url]leinbergeranz@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks....
